LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Bonesaw.label: Bonesaw
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Bonesaw.description: Theres never a dull moment with a doctor armed with this and their favourite phrases at the ready. "Trust me! You won't feel a thing" And "Oops, is this supposed to bleed so much?".
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Bonesaw.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Bonesaw.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Breadener.label: Breadknife
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Breadener.description: Your favourite tool for cutting bread and ending quarrels.
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Breadener.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Chipper.label: Chiphook
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Chipper.description: What is a stone, eh? you cut it, you mold it, you chip it with a chiphook. Some say it's ruining a perfectly good stone; Others say it's art.
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Chipper.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Chipper.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Cleaverer.label: Meat cleaver
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Cleaverer.description: Tool designed to separate meat from bones and casting menacing shadows through shower curtains.
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Cleaverer.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Croppy.label: Riding crop
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Croppy.description: While virtually useless as a weapon, Riding crops have proven to give extremely dominant image of the wielder, and thus speeding up the recruitment and taming process.
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Croppy.tools.crop.label: crop
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Danny.label: Machete
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Danny.description: Meant to be used for clearing path in dense jungles, Nowadays mostly used for clearing density from someone's shoulders.
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Danny.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Danny.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Danny.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_DeckardCane.label: Cane
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_DeckardCane.description: Cane with a heavy knob as a handle. Makes the user seem all the more respectable and very suave. Also helps them keep on their feet.
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_MankiWrench.label: Mechano-Wrench
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_MankiWrench.description: Ginormous wrench, mainly used in spaceship maintenance but could technically be applied to mechanoid disassembly process
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Needler.label: Tailorer 3000
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Needler.description: Ginormous needle with attached scissors. It's not known what kind of twisted mind conjured up this tool but it's been found to be efficient at what it does.
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Needler.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Pickle.label: Pneumatic Pick
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Pickle.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Pickle.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Spatula.label: Spatula
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Spatula.description: The most cheftacular equipment for cooking. Or shaming your rivals with it's majestic slap.
LanguageData.MeleeWeaponry_Spatula.tools.head.label: head
